trans-unit.target: TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_SEQ_00<tab>The House Manderville artisan stands ready to facilitate your augmentation request. ※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_SEQ_01<tab>You approach the House Manderville artisan with a request to augment a different Manderville weapon. The ever-enthusiastic craftsman asks only that you supply him with the necessary chunks of complementary chondrite─a substance which is, of course, only available from a particular merchant for a very particular type of currency.
※You may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
※Chunks of complementary chondrite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.

TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_SEQ_02<tab>You make the required meteoritic contribution, and are once more blessed to witness a collaboration of artisanal brilliance. Encouraged by Gerolt's grudging praise, the House Manderville artisan bids you call upon him again should you have other armaments you wish to have augmented.

TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Obtain chunks of complementary chondrite)) ((With <var 08 E4E80514 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F1960202 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 03F296130202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80515 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F296010202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80516 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F296020202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80517 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F296030202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80518 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F296040202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80519 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F296080202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8051A ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F296090202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8051C ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F2960A0202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8051D ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F2960B0202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8051F ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F296050202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80520 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F296070202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80521 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F296060202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80522 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F2960C0202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80523 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F2960D0202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80524 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F2960E0202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80526 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F2960F0202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80527 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F296100202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80528 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F296120202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80529 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F296110202 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var> in your inventory or Armoury Chest, deliver the chunks of complementary chondrite to the House Manderville artisan)) /var>.

TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>Please note that upon completing the quest “The Next Mander-level,” you will receive a Manderville weapon for <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Please ensure you have changed to your desired job before speaking with the House Manderville artisan.
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_Q1_000_001<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_A1_000_002<tab>Undertake this quest as another job.

TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_A1_000_003<tab>Undertake this quest as <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>Please speak with the House Manderville artisan again when you are ready to undertake this quest.

TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>You have already received <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var>. Please change to a different job and speak with the House Manderville artisan again.
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>You have already received <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>. Please change to a different job and speak with the House Manderville artisan again.

TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>In order to accept the quest “The Next Mander-level,” please ensure that <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var> are either equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory.

TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>In order to accept the quest “The Next Mander-level,” please ensure that <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> is either equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory.
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_CRAFTER04653_000_010<tab>Am I free to perform an augmentation? Why, certainly, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>!

TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_CRAFTER04653_000_011<tab>You need but contribute the necessary quantity of complementary chondrite, and we can elevate your Manderville weaponry to the next Mander-level, ahahaha! Ahem. Three chunks, if you please.
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>Chunks of complementary chondrite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.

TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_CRAFTER04653_000_020<tab>Yes, that would be <var 1A 02 /var>three<var 1A 01 /var> chunks of complementary chondrite, I'm afraid. We wouldn't wish to upset the delicate balance of your armaments with an unproven ratio now, would we?
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>Chunks of complementary chondrite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_CRAFTER04653_000_030<tab><sniff> Is that chondrite I smell? Splendid! If you would be so kind as to unbuckle your weaponry...?
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_CRAFTER04653_000_031<tab>Are we ready to proceed, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>?

TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_CRAFTER04653_000_040<tab>Very good. As for my inner fires, I assure you that they burn hotter than Master Gerolt's furnace. Let us bring the blacksmith and his hammer to bear, shall we?
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_GEROLT_000_041<tab>...An' done! What do ye think o' that, eh?
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_GEROLT_000_042<tab>We've upgraded ye to <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> an' <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var>!
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_GEROLT_000_043<tab>We've upgraded ye to <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>!
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_CRAFTER04653_000_044<tab>Another collaborative triumph, Master Gerolt! I feel the more I work at your side, the closer I come towards achieving true mastery!
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_GEROLT_000_045<tab>Hah! Don't be daft, ye trouser-less twit! I've seen better craftsmen in a goblin's nursery!
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_GEROLT_000_046<tab>An' while we're yappin', his lordship made ye do the same “martial meditation” as me, didn't he? What'd he have ye fight, then?
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_CRAFTER04653_000_047<tab>I locked tusks, as it were, with a furious gaja of Saltwind's Welcome.
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_GEROLT_000_048<tab>Y-Ye mean one o' them huge stompin' brutes!? An' ye took it down!?
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_CRAFTER04653_000_049<tab>Yes, though I barely survived with my smallclothes intact...
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_GEROLT_000_050<tab>D-Did ye, now...? <cough> Might be as I was exaggeratin' a bit earlier. Yer a credit to yer craft, so keep at it, all right?
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_CRAFTER04653_000_051<tab>I will, Master Gerolt!
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_CRAFTER04653_000_060<tab>A superlative result as usual, Master Gerolt! I could ask for no finer example to aspire to in my own pursuit of perfection!
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_GEROLT_000_061<tab>Aye, when ye've got the gift like I have, ye can fix up any weapon ye put yer hand to! ...Ye did help a little, o' course.

TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_CRAFTER04653_000_070<tab>There you have it, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Should you have further need of our augmentation services, we are at your beck and call.
TEXT_CHRHDY251_04726_CRAFTER04653_000_071<tab>All we require is a handful of chondrite and a few moments of your time!
